subject: Order
description_text:
Hello, 

My apologies, my name is Randall Campbell. I just completed an order for Plus X P2-H2 pedal set. I did not notice it was PC only. I know that was a major oversight. Is there any way to cancel the order before it is processed and shipped? Again, my apologies. 

Randall Campbell
rac.adamcampbell@gmail.com
1-443-783-8088


Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Adam Campbell,    Okay, we've terminated the logistics for your parcel. What device are you using? If it's not compatible, we'll cancel your order for you.

Thrustmaster TX servo base into a Xbox series S

R. Adam Campbell
rac.adamcampbell@gmail.com
(443)783-8088


On Mon, Sep 8, 2025 at 03:05 service@simsonn.com
Unfortunately, this is indeed incompatible and we will cancel your order.

Ok, thank you. My apologies again.


On Mon, Sep 8, 2025 at 06:39 service@simsonn.com
